name: Zhehao 40 Pcs Erasable Highlighters, Smooth Writing Double Head Highlighter for School Office Back to School Supplies Occ Shoebox Gifts
short_description: Double Head Design: our erasable highlighters adopt double head design, one end is a highlighter, and the other end is a place for erasing, if you write something by mistake, you can erase it as you like; The erasable highlighters combine the erasable ink and eraser, so you don't be afraid of making mistakes, it's very convenient and inclusive

Multipurpose and Multicolor: the pastel highlighters are available in 10 assorted bright colors for you to pick, when you are reading books or taking notes, the highlighters can help you emphasize the important information; Which can be applied in textbooks, journals, notes etc., and you can also use them to graffiti and color

Molded Narrow Chisel Tip Design: the design of the pen tip of the dual end highlighter is a molded narrow chisel tip, that combine wide highlighter, thin underlines and small part for writing in one, you can write and create as you like

Fast Drying and No Bleed: erasable markers are made of quality plastic material, sturdy and long lasting, and the ink can dry quickly and don't seep around the page when you use, so they will not easily get your hands or books dirty, providing you with a smooth writing experience

Cute and Practical Gifts: you can share erasable highlighters markers as gifts for your family, children, friends, colleagues, teachers, students, classmates and more, suitable for back to school supplies, office supplies, birthday, advertising, anniversary, festivals, ceremony, awards, weddings, business and so on
product_description: Features: Lightweight and portable: Each highlighter pen measures approx. 16.9 x 1 cm/ 6.65 x 0.4 inch, lightweight and portable, easy for you to carry around for your any time writing. Widely applied: Colored highlighters are widely applied in home, school, office and more, suitable for journaling, planning, work, study, note taking, annotating and more, so practical and versatile. name: Pilot FriXion Fineliner Erasable Marker Pens, Fine Point 0.7 mm, Pack of 12, Assorted Colors, Erasable Pens - Ideal for School, Journaling, & Office Writing
short_description: Stress-Free Writing: Write, draw, erase, and redraw repeatedly without damaging documents or illustrations; unique thermo-sensitive ink vanishes completely with friction using these Pilot FriXion Erasable Pens 0.5

Power to the Pen: Express yourself effortlessly with Pilot's line of innovative writing tools - including gel ink, rolling ball, ballpoint & fountain pens, dry erase markers & more. The perfect study partner, journaling tool, & office essential

Quick Drying: Fast-drying ink won’t bleed through paper, smudge, or smear; the Pilot FriXion pens 12-pack includes black, blue, light blue, red, green, yellow, orange, lime, pink, light pink, purple, and brown marker pens

Classic Design: The original capped erasable marker pen has smooth, colorful ink & adds a touch of creativity & style to everyday tasks; assortment of multicolored pens in 1 pack. Ideal for long study sessions, planner notes, or professional projects

Perfect for Every Use: From school supplies and homework to bullet journaling, planners, and office notes, FriXion adapts to your writing needs. Loved by students, parents, teachers, and professionals alike

To erase, use a FriXion eraser. Note: Heat from erasing friction or other sources, will cause FriXion thermosensitive ink to become colorless at temperatures >140ºF. To restore color, cool to at least 14ºF in a freezer. FriXion is not recommended for use on legal or official documents.
product_description: This Pilot erasable pens FriXion collection unleashes your creativity and style. Write, draw, erase, re-do, and create clean, polished documents or sketches without damage or messy eraser residue. Whether you’re taking notes, making lists, or illustrating designs, these innovative markers remain ideal for students, teachers, and professionals. Perfect for school supplies, journaling, planners, homework, and office notes, the 0.7 mm fine point strikes a balance between delicate and bold lines, supporting everyday writing needs, long study sessions, and professional use. Acid-free blue ink is formulated to be long-lasting and fade-resistant, ensuring work endures. Plus, FriXion is the only pen authenticated by the nation’s leading Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math (STEM) education organization and is trusted by teachers, parents, professionals, and creatives alike. With this versatile range of colored erasable pens for school, you hold the power of infinite creative possibilities in your hand. To erase, use a FriXion eraser. Note: Heat from erasing friction or other sources, will cause FriXion thermosensitive ink to become colorless at temperatures >140ºF. To restore color, cool to at least 14ºF in a freezer. FriXion is not recommended for use on legal or official documents.
